scripts.build: npm run setup && npm run resources && webpack-cli ./src/index.js -o www/js && npx cap sync
scripts.debug: npm run build && cd android && ./gradlew assembleDebug && cp app/build/outputs/apk/debug/app-debug.apk ../ytm-debug.apk
scripts.release: npm run build && cd android && ./gradlew assembleRelease && cp app/build/outputs/apk/release/app-release-unsigned.apk ../ytm-unsigned.apk
